briefTitle: Clinical Outcomes of Patients Undergoing Skin-Reducing Mastectomies
officialTitle: Clinical Outcomes of Patients Undergoing Skin-Reducing Mastectomies: A Long-Term Retrospective Study.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* breast cancer affected women with moderate-large Breast underwent to skin reducing mastectomy.
* High risk breast cancer ( BRCA1 and/or 2 mutated) women with moderate-large Breast underwent to skin reducing mastectomy.

Exclusion Criteria:

-
